about.title: About Us
about.sort_summary: MyPicDocs has been under the capable management of Dileep Kumar Patel and Dhiraj Kumar. Over the years, our company has experienced significant growth and diversification, evolving into a nationwide leader in managed IT services and solutions. We take pride in offering a comprehensive range of IT products and services. Our team of IT experts is highly specialized in various cutting-edge technologies, allowing us to provide top-notch solutions tailored to the unique needs of our clients. We primarily focus on serving small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and play a pivotal role in assisting them in their growth journeys

our_team.name: Dileep Kumar Patel
our_team.carrer_summary: A Django developer is a web based professional with expertise in creating web applications using the Django framework, a powerful Python-based web framework. Their role involves crafting, developing, and deploying web applications that align with client needs while adhering to industry best practices for software development, code management, and testing. These developers often employ web content management systems to facilitate the creation and maintenance of web applications. In today's tech landscape, they also delve into gaining a deeper understanding of Python web frameworks such as Flask and Django to enhance their skills and provide clients with improved web solutions.

our_team.name: Dileep Kumar Patel
our_team.carrer_summary: A Django developer is a software professional with expertise in creating web applications using the Django framework, a powerful Python-based web framework. Their role involves crafting, developing, and deploying web applications that align with client needs while adhering to industry best practices for software development, code management, and testing. These developers often employ web content management systems to facilitate the creation and maintenance of web applications. In today's tech landscape, they also delve into gaining a deeper understanding of Python web frameworks such as Flask and Django to enhance their skills and provide clients with improved web solutions.
